summary: A mischievous 14-year-old boy and his irresponsible uncle almost ruin Christmas when they decide to take Santa's new high-tech sleigh for a joyride.
cast: Josh Zuckerman|Brenda Grate|Bryan Cranston|Jefferson Mappin|Barclay Hope|Torri Higginson|Rhys Williams|Sandy Robson|Jeff Geddis|Jung-Yul Kim|Jamie Robinson|Oliver Dennis|Joe Bostick|Santiago Garcia|Paul MacFarlane|Billy Parrott|Joanne Reece|Joshua Watkis|Benz Antoine|Gerry Fiorini|Carl Luff|Alex McMains|Sheldon Smith
title: Salvad la Navidad
